name: The Dungeon Keeper
description:
Originally made for this GameJam:

https://itch.io/jam/100-prize-ultimate-jamming-championship-1

Song: Rules of Nature by Maniac Agenda

"The Dungeon Keeper" puts you in the roll of the Dungeon Boss while using retro game mechanics. You must protect the dungeon from adventures who steal the treasures by EATING them.

Run accross the maze collecting all the Gold cubes to seal the dungeon and eat the ones who stand in your way by taking the Red capsule. You can´t touch the enemies without the Red Capsule.
